LanguageData.SleepingSpot_Blueprint_Install.label: sleeping spot (blueprint)
LanguageData.BagBed.label: Bolsa de dormir
LanguageData.BagBed.description: Un saco de dormir para dormir en la naturaleza. Ligera y cómoda.
LanguageData.BagBed_Blueprint.label: sleeping bag (blueprint)
LanguageData.BagBed_Blueprint_Install.label: sleeping bag (blueprint)
LanguageData.BagBed_Frame.label: sleeping bag (building)
LanguageData.BagBed_Frame.description: A sleeping bag for sleeping in the wild. Lightweigh and comfy.
LanguageData.HayBed.label: Cama de heno
LanguageData.HayBed.description: Una cama improvisada, hecha de heno y pequeñas ramas. Sólo un paso por encima de dormir en el suelo. No muy saludable para dormir.
LanguageData.HayBed_Blueprint.label: hay bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.HayBed_Blueprint_Install.label: hay bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.HayBed_Frame.label: hay bed (building)
LanguageData.HayBed_Frame.description: A makeshift bed, made of hay and small branches. Just a step above sleeping on the ground. Not very healthy to sleep on.
LanguageData.HideBed.label: Cama oculta
LanguageData.HideBed.description: Se trata de una cama improvisada hecha colocando pieles de cuero sobre una plataforma de troncos. No es la cama más cómoda del mundo, pero lo hará.
LanguageData.HideBed_Blueprint.label: hide bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.HideBed_Blueprint_Install.label: hide bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.HideBed_Frame.label: hide bed (building)
LanguageData.HideBed_Frame.description: This is an improvised bed made by placing leather hides over a platform of logs. Not the most comfortable bed in the world, but it'll do.
LanguageData.HideBedDouble.label: Cama oculta doble
LanguageData.HideBedDouble.description: Se trata de una cama improvisada hecha poniendo pieles de cuero sobre una plataforma de troncos y lo suficientemente grande para dos personas. No es la cama más cómoda del mundo, pero lo hará.
LanguageData.HideBedDouble_Blueprint.label: hide bed double (blueprint)
LanguageData.HideBedDouble_Blueprint_Install.label: hide bed double (blueprint)
LanguageData.HideBedDouble_Frame.label: hide bed double (building)
LanguageData.HideBedDouble_Frame.description: This is an improvised bed made by placing leather hides over a platform of logs and big enough for two people. Not the most comfortable bed in the world, but it'll do.
LanguageData.Medieval_single_bed.label: Cama de colchón
LanguageData.Medieval_single_bed.description: Dormir en una plataforma de troncos es bueno, pero un poco de relleno va a un largo camino para una buena noche de sueño.
LanguageData.Medieval_single_bed_Blueprint.label: mattress bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.Medieval_single_bed_Frame.label: mattress bed (building)
LanguageData.Medieval_single_bed_Frame.description: Sleeping on a platform of logs is as well and good, but a bit of padding goes a long way for a good night's sleep.
LanguageData.Medieval_double_bed.label: Colchón cama doble
LanguageData.Medieval_double_bed.description: Dormir en una plataforma de troncos es bueno, pero un poco de relleno va a un largo camino para una buena noche de sueño. Sólo lo suficientemente grande para acomodar a dos.
LanguageData.Medieval_double_bed_Blueprint.label: mattress double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.Medieval_double_bed_Frame.label: mattress double bed (building)
LanguageData.Medieval_double_bed_Frame.description: Sleeping on a platform of logs is as well and good, but a bit of padding goes a long way for a good night's sleep. Just big enough for accommodate two.
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed.label: Cama industrial
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed.description: Una cama cómoda. Un solo espacio. El boom de la producción industrial llevó a la necesidad de trabajadores más calificados en los Rimworlds más desarrollados. Las limitaciones del espacio impulsaron el desarrollo de muebles más avanzados. Como resultado, este diseño de cama muy simple surgió.
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed_Blueprint.label: industrial bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed_Frame.label: industrial bed (building)
LanguageData.industrial_single_bed_Frame.description: A comfy bed. Fits one. The boom of industrial production led to the need of more qualified workers on the more developed Rimworlds. The constraints of space drove the development of more advanced furniture. As a result this quite simple bed design emerged.
LanguageData.industrial_double_bed.label: Cama doble industrial
LanguageData.industrial_double_bed.description: Una cama cómoda. Se adapta a dos. El boom de la producción industrial llevó a la necesidad de trabajadores más calificados en los Rimworlds más desarrollados. Las limitaciones del espacio impulsaron el desarrollo de muebles más avanzados. Como resultado, este diseño de cama muy simple surgió.
LanguageData.industrial_double_bed_Blueprint.label: industrial double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.industrial_double_bed_Frame.label: industrial double bed (building)
LanguageData.industrial_double_bed_Frame.description: A comfy bed. Fits two. The boom of industrial production led to the need of more qualified workers on the more developed Rimworlds. The constraints of space drove the development of more advanced furniture. As a result this quite simple bed design emerged.
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT.label: Cama de la cárcel
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT.description: Una cama en la pared para tus prisioneros. Se adapta sólo a uno. Ningún esfuerzo fue ahorrado para hacer que esta cama pareciera salir de la más oscura y profunda mazmorra. La menor cantidad de comodidad y una superficie dura para dormir le permitirá a sus presos permanecer alerta a las cosas más infimas. Un arte bien conocido entre los señores medievales de Rimworld.
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT_Blueprint.label: prison bed (R) (blueprint)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT_Frame.label: prison bed (R) (building)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_RT_Frame.description: A bed on a wall for your prisoners. Fits only one. No effort was spared to make this bed look like it came out of the darkest deepest dungeon. The least amount of comfort and a hard surface to sleep will let your prisoners stay alert to finer things of their stay. An art well known among the medieval lords of the Rimworlds.
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_LB.label: Cama de la cárcel
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_LB.description: Una cama en la pared para tus prisioneros. Se adapta sólo a uno. Ningún esfuerzo fue ahorrado para hacer que esta cama pareciera salir de la más oscura y profunda mazmorra. La menor cantidad de comodidad y una superficie dura para dormir le permitirá a sus presos permanecer alerta a las cosas más infimas. Un arte bien conocido entre los señores medievales de Rimworld.
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_LB_Blueprint.label: prison bed (L) (blueprint)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_LB_Frame.label: prison bed (L) (building)
LanguageData.prison_single_bed_LB_Frame.description: A bed on a wall for your prisoners. Fits only one. No effort was spared to make this bed look like it came out of the darkest deepest dungeon. The least amount of comfort and a hard surface to sleep will let your prisoners stay alert to finer things of their stay. An art well known among the medieval lords of the Rimworlds.
LanguageData.MilleniumBed.label: Cama Milenio
LanguageData.MilleniumBed_Blueprint.label: millenium bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.MilleniumBed_Blueprint_Install.label: millenium bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.MilleniumBed_Frame.label: millenium bed (building)
LanguageData.MilleniumDoubleBed.label: Cama doble de milenio
LanguageData.MilleniumDoubleBed_Blueprint.label: millenium double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.MilleniumDoubleBed_Frame.label: millenium double bed (building)
LanguageData.PodBed.label: Cama capsula
LanguageData.PodBed.description: Una cama futurista con gran eficacia de descanso.
LanguageData.PodBed_Blueprint.label: pod bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.PodBed_Blueprint_Install.label: pod bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.PodBed_Frame.label: pod bed (building)
LanguageData.PodBed_Frame.description: A futuristic bed with high rest effectiveness.
LanguageData.space_double_bed.label: double pod bed
LanguageData.space_double_bed.description: Una cama cómoda. Se adapta a dos. En la tarea de "ir al espacio" esta cama literalmente se desarrolló como una pequeña nave espacial. Después de este primer error fatal la posibilidad de dormir dentro y un poco más de comodidad se añadió. Esto no impidió que la agencia publicitaria usara los términos "volar en su sueño" y "dormir sobre nubes". Después de varias demandas de clientes con extrañas lesiones el anuncio cambió a una dirección más realista.
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Blueprint.label: double pod bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Blueprint_Install.label: double pod bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Frame.label: double pod bed (building)
LanguageData.space_double_bed_Frame.description: A comfy bed. Fits two. On the task of "going to space" this bed was literally first developed as a small spacecraft. After this fatal first mistake the possibility to sleep inside and a bit more comfort was added. This didn't prevent the advertising agency from using the terms "fly in your sleep" and "sleeping on clouds". After several lawsuits from customers with strange injuries the advertisment changed to a more down-to-earth direction.
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed.label: Cripto cama individual
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed.description: Una cómoda cama cripto. Un solo espacio. Durante la investigación de criptosueño, surgió la posibilidad de un ciclo de sueño corto basado en esta tecnología. Sin embargo, la mayoría de las personas todavía se niegan a usar estas camas con miedo de nunca despertar o perder varios años por accidente. Esto condujo a varias leyendas de Rimworld aunque todo expuesto por los científicos como storys ficticios mucha gente teme el dispositivo.
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed_Blueprint.label: crypto single bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed_Blueprint_Install.label: crypto single bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed_Frame.label: crypto single bed (building)
LanguageData.cryo_single_bed_Frame.description: A comfy crypto bed. Fits one. During the research of cryptosleep the possibilty of a short sleeping cycle based on this technology emerged. However most people still refuse to use these beds in fear of never waking up or losing several years by accident. This lead to several Rimworld legends although all exposed by scientists as fictional storys many people fear the device.
LanguageData.cryo_double_bed.label: Cripto cama doble
LanguageData.cryo_double_bed.description: Una cómoda cama cripto. Se adapta a dos. Durante la investigación de criptosueño, surgió la posibilidad de un ciclo de sueño corto basado en esta tecnología. Sin embargo, la mayoría de las personas todavía se niegan a usar estas camas con miedo de nunca despertar o perder varios años por accidente. Esto condujo a varias leyendas de Rimworld aunque todo expuesto por los científicos como storys ficticios mucha gente teme el dispositivo.
LanguageData.cryo_double_bed_Blueprint.label: crypto double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.cryo_double_bed_Blueprint_Install.label: crypto double bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.cryo_double_bed_Frame.label: crypto double bed (building)
LanguageData.cryo_double_bed_Frame.description: A comfy crypto bed. Fits two. During the research of cryptosleep the possibilty of a short sleeping cycle based on this technology emerged. However most people still refuse to use these beds in fear of never waking up or losing several years by accident. This lead to several Rimworld legends although all exposed by scientists as fictional storys many people fear the device.
LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed.label: Cama de hospital avanzada
LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed.description: Una cama avanzada especialmente diseñada para tratar a las personas heridas. Mejora las posibilidades de éxito del trabajo médico incluso más que la cama del hospital.
LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed_Blueprint.label: advanced hospital bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed_Blueprint_Install.label: advanced hospital bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed_Frame.label: advanced hospital bed (building)
LanguageData.AdvHospitalBed_Frame.description: An advanced bed specially designed to treat injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work even more than the hospital bed.
